titleStmt.title: Happy merchandise or Wisdoms excellency darkly discovered or rather greatly obscured by words without knowledge By Charles Phelps.
titleStmt.author: Phelpes, Charles.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Steven Swart, bookseller at the Crowned Bible, neere the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: February 25. 1669/79. Coppied out June 25.1670.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
